pluginstrument.author: Jack Zero
pluginstrument.description:
Full cockpit controls for Ddenn's Bombardier Challenger 300 with popups for full control of the pedestal and FMC. Designed to be used on a single full HD touchscreen. The FMC popup is designed to work with the latest version of XHSI. It will (currently) not work with UFMC or the default X-Plane FMC.
This version of the cockpit is designed to run in conjunction with three XHSI instances (showing one PFD and three NDs) as well as my AirManager PFD overlay, MFDs, clock and standby instrument. The required config files for XHSI are included in the displays directories. Be sure to set the correct AptNav resource directory as well as the UDP ports in the plugin after installing the config files.
Note that the minimum requirement for the instrument is the 10.36 version of the Challeger 300 in combination with my (unofficial) patch 10.36 Patch 2 for the Challenger, see: http://forums.x-plane.org/index.php?showtopic=87865
